de.hsrm.swt02.businesslogic.processors

Class StartProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsrm.swt02.businesslogic.processors.StartProcessor

  • public class StartProcessor
extends Object
    This class implements the function of StartTrigger. It creates a new item and saves it.

    • Method Detail

      • createItem

        public String createItem(Workflow workflow)
                  throws LogicException
        This method receives an workflow-object and creates an item and calls a method which instantiates its Metadata according to the workflow's initialized steps. The item consists of pairs of step IDs and its MetaState.
        Parameters:
        workflow - it's id will be noted within a new item
        Returns:
        itemId
        Throws:
        LogicException

      • initiateItem

        public void initiateItem(Workflow workflow,
                Item item)
                  throws LogicException
        This method instantiates an item's Metadata. The default MetaState is INACTIVE. Only "Action" step-objects are considered. After successfully creating and initializing the item, add it to workflow. The state of the very first step is set to "OPEN".
        Parameters:
        workflow - provides a step list, which will be transformed into Metadatas
        item - is the freshly created item for a workflow
        Throws:
        LogicException - is thrown if there are problems while persisting
